valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 30 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 1 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 953 expected 300 miles west of Rockall 962 by 0600 tomorrow. Low German Bight 985 moving steadily northeast and losing its identity
